topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXX, Public Diplomacy
topic.body: This volume documents the public diplomacy efforts of the Jimmy Carter administration. A major emphasis of the volume is the role the United States Information Agency played in the formulation and implementation of public diplomacy.
topic.image-description: Book cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1977–1980, Volume XXX, Public Diplomacy
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
